description: You find yourself in a beautifully decorated bedchamber. You are lying on a bed which looks like it once belonged to a very rich and mighty person. Next to you is a small table with a book. Next to the book there is a small glass that contains some yellow liquid in it. On the other side of the room there is a fireplace. There is no window in the room, but a small wooden door, which hopefully leads out of this place.
